La Liga 2011-12 Preview: Real Madrid Vs Osasuna

[url=www71.litado.edu.vn/real-dung-tuong-lua-quanh-sao-tre/]real dung tuong lua quanh sao tre[/url]
Real Madrid are set to host Osasuna on Sunday, November 6, 2011, in the La Liga.

Real Madrid are coming off a 1-0 away win against Real Sociedad in their last La Liga encounter. Higuain struck on 9 minutes to give Madrid an early lead and that was sufficient to ensure three points from the game for the visitors. The goal transpired after Fabio Coentrao advanced from his left-back position and who delivered a perfect pass to Higuain who scooped the ball over the advancing Claudio Bravo, into the Sociedad goal. Sociedad gave a better account of themselves in the second half but hardly troubled Madrid who remained dominant throughout and were in fact unlucky to miss a few more opportunities to score, most notably by Sergio Ramos, Di Maria and Ronaldo.

Osasuna beat Levante 2-0, in last week's league match. Levante, who were on a seven-match unbeaten run, were handed their first loss of the season and forced to relinquish their top spot on the points table. Alvaro Cejudo put the home side ahead on 40 minutes and Nino made it 2-0, a few minutes later. The hosts were reduced to 10 men when Cejudo was sent off, with a second yellow, after the interval but had no difficulty keeping the Levante attack at bay, though Kone and Suarez came close to scoring.

Head to head, the teams have met in 20 league matches in the last 10 years; Real Madrid have won on 12 of those occasions, while Osasuna have won on 5, with the remaining 3 games drawn. The teams last met in January, in a game hosted by Osasuna, with the hosts winning 1-0.

Real Madrid who are currently at the top of the points table have won 8 of their last 10 games, with one loss and one draw completing the tally. Eighth placed Osasuna have won 3 and lost 2 of their last 10, with the remaining 5 games ending in stalemates.

Madrid have had a perfect home record this season, winning all four games hosted this far; Osasuna have drawn three and lost 2 of 5 games on the road.

Real Madrid's starting eleven against Sociedad: Iker Cassilas, Fabio Coentrao, Pepe, Sergio Ramos, Alvaro Coca, Cristiano Ronaldo, Xabi Alonso, Mesut Ozil, Lassana Diarra, Angel Di Maria, and Gonzalo Higuain.

Osasuna's starting eleven against Levante: Andres Fernandez, Sergio, Lolo, Jukka Raitala, Marc Bertran, Raul Garcia, Javad Nekounam, Francisco Punal, Ibrahima Balde, Juan Francisco Martinez, and Alvaro Cejudo.

Successful Viral Marketing Campaigns

To be successful in viral marketing campaigns, it is necessary to create a healthy curiosity about your products, so that people will be persuaded to transfer the information about your products or services to others. For receiving a positive response from your targeted audience, unique and effective viral marketing techniques are to be adopted. http://litado.com

<b>Uniqueness of Viral Promotion </b>

The main advantage of viral marketing campaigns is that they help in successfully promoting your products and services among the public without raising huge funds for advertising. By means of such promotion techniques, business owners can successfully market almost all their products and services to a number of customers for a considerable period of time.

Viral promotion campaigns are considered an economical and enormously influential mode of advertisement. Through viral promotion campaigns, your website will achieve higher rankings on leading viral advertising websites. This will help attract more visitors towards your website, which in turn improves your sales and revenue. ho?c seo

<b>Strategic Analysis and Planning Produce Perfect Results </b>

In order to be triumphant in viral promotion campaigns, it is essential to have well organized and interesting viral games, videos, images and perfect contents. Consequently for developing viral ads for your products and services, it is always sensible to hire the services of a viral advertising company. The significant viral promotion procedures employed by these companies include the following:

o Development of website
<br>o Planned viral advertising consulting
<br>o Multimedia development
<br>o Planning and development of viral campaigns
<br>o Creation of viral email campaigns
<br>o Creation and management of viral contents
<br>o Social media promotion
<br>o Web analytics tracking
<br>o Preservation of reports

In order to make sure that the viral advertisements are receiving good coverage, these companies always work with numerous online newsletters, forums, blogs and video content sharing websites. For the purpose, these companies have a panel of skilled and dedicated professionals, who offer budget friendly and timely solutions, based on your unique business requirements. Therefore always take care to select the right company to satisfy your targeted viral promotion goals.

Through proper planning and implementation of appropriate viral marketing techniques, you can definitely outshine your competitors in online business.

Five Best Beaches To Relax On A Gap Year In Vietnam

Mui Ne Tour

A five hour bus ride from Ho Chi Minh, Mui Ne's fine stretch of beach is a hot favourite for both tourists and expats looking to make the break from Vietnam's largest district. Home to a very good number of budget hostels all jostling for competition among the gap year throngs, Mui Ne also has other attractions like the desert-like sand dunes of Doi Cat and a acceptable series of small fishing villages a little further up the coast.

Vung Tau Tour

Only a half hours hydrofoil trip from the centre of , Vung Tau is where the Vietnamese flock each weekend to get some respite from another busy week ahead. Although not as quiet as Mui Ne or Da Nang, Vung Tau is a much larger beach town and has plenty of very good restaurants and bars to sample. Restaurant very good afternoon Vietnam is particularly popular among gap year travellers for its pizza.

Da Lat Tour

The long coastline running the middle of Vietnam is perhaps the most acceptable part of the province and home to the busy coastal town of Da Lat . Famed for its many scuba schools and snorkelling tours, Da Lat is close to many small islands that boats head out to for divers to enjoy coral reefs scattered nearby. Asides from its stunning stretch of Nha trang beach, the town also boasts busy nightlife with bars like Guava, Red Apple and Why Not running late into the night.

Quan Lan Tours

Just off the bottom of Vietnam, near the part of the city that borders Campodge, is the island of Phu Quoc. Largely unheard of as a gap year destination, the island is made up of untouched, pristine beaches making it a possible to have a spot all of your own. What's more is that hiring a boat out to snorkel amid the coral reefs is just as simple as heading to the port town of An Thoi district. at the foot of the island.

Travel Tips - Top Destinations in Vietnam, From Hanoi to Ho

If you never thought of Vietnam as a top travel destination, you're probably not alone. However, you'd also be missing out on a spectacular, unique and exciting experience. Vietnam is like no other country on earth, and boasts a distinct culture thanks to the country's rich history. While Vietnam is not a particularly large country, it has a high level of geographic diversity, which means that you can pursue a variety of different experiences on one trip. Here are a few of the top travel destinations in Vietnam, from cities to silent retreats.

Phu Quoc Island

Just off the bottom of Vietnam, near the part of the country that borders Cambodia, is the island of Du Lich Phu QuocLargely unheard of as a gap year destination, the island is made up of untouched, pristine beaches making it a possible to have a spot all of your own. What's more is that hiring a boat out to snorkel amid the coral reefs is just as simple as heading to the port town of An Thoi at the foot of the island.

Hanoi: This is the capital city of Vietnam and is a common point of arrival. Hanoi is the second-largest city in Vietnam and offers a spectacular fusion of eastern and western cultures, due to the French and Chinese influences from past occupations. In addition to stunning architecture, Hanoi offers an impressive lineup of museums and has a vibrant nightlife.

Ho Chi Minh: Also known as Saigon, TP.Ho Chi Minh is the most populous metropolis in Vietnam and is a major tourist attraction. The city is rich with cultural and historical destinations, including Reunification Palace and Notre Dame Cathedral. Ho Chi Minh City also offers several water parks and other locations for enjoying nature.

Da Lat Travels

These roses are native to Tham Quan Da Latwhich is a city in Vietnam. They are available in various colors and shades including red, yellow and pink. These flowers are quite long lasting as they can last from 7-15 days when placed in a vase. Moreover, they are quite famous all over the country and are bestsellers in big cities. In addition to Vietnam, these flowers are favored in Europe as well.

Du Lich Nha Trang: This seaside town is the most well-known resort in Vietnam and is so entrancing that you may forget that you're in Vietnam. Scuba diving abounds in Nha Trang, and there are plenty of cruises, live music and other forms of entertainment available. in Nha Trang also boasts a healthy shopping scene and several museums and landmarks.
